page.title: 03The Fields through the Year
page.content: When it starts to get hot farmers sow the seed.Then about a month after they {spray the crop. }After another few weeks they give it another spray.The spray is weed killer and pesticide mixed.They spray the field about seven or eight times a year.When they sow the fields each year they have a different crop.For example one year{ {corn}the next year {barley}the year after corn and so on.Farmers have cut down orchards I know because it was difficult to get{apple pickers.}There used to be about one thousand apple trees in one{orchard.
